programme.title: Para tentar salvar Koichi, Josuke vai à casa de Okuyasu Nijimura, mas é atacado por seu irmão, Keicho. Josuke propõe um acordo a Okuyasu, que está ferido.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A caminho da escola de bicicleta, Koichi atropela um gato dentro de um saco. Um homem vê o acidente e chantageia Koichi, exigindo que ele pague pelo enterro do animal.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi tentam descobrir se o colega de escola Toshikazu Hazamada está mesmo usando um Stand e encontram um boneco de madeira no armário dele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Meu Amigo Pé Grande, (2009, Children)
programme.desc: Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, Pé Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura. Mas quando dois valentões encontram o Pé Grande, eles decidem capturá-lo. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o Pé Grande e devolvê-lo à sua casa.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Ninja, (2018, Animated)
programme.desc: Em uma fábrica ilegal de bonecas na Tailândia, um empresário malvado explora crianças trabalhadoras. Após um infeliz acidente, uma boneca ganha vida e viaja para a Dinamarca, onde faz amizade com um garoto, pedindo ajuda para se vingar.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: As Crônicas de Spiderwick, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Esta aventura de fantasia é adaptada da série de livros campeã de vendas, que revela um mundo nunca visto que existe ao nosso redor.

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: Lucia e o Cristal Mágico, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Lucia é a primeira menina da Escola Internacional de Natal. Quando seu melhor amigo, Oscar, é acusado de roubar o cristal mágico do Rei Inverno, que alimenta a máquina atual, Lucia se propõe a provar a inocência dele.

programme.title: Aventura Em Duas Rodas, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas.

programme.title: Império Proibido, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: No início do século 18, o cartógrafo Jonathan Green empreende uma viagem científica da Europa para o Oriente. Passando pela Transilvânia e cruzando as montanhas dos Cárpatos, ele encontra uma pequena vila perdida na floresta.

programme.title: As Travessuras de Uma Sereia, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um projeto de propriedade de Xuan envolvendo a recuperação do mar ameaça a subsistência das sereias que dependem do mar para sobreviver. A sereia Shan é enviada para parar Xuan e levá-lo para que faça projeto em outro local.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: Metendo os Pés Pelas Mãos, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Danny McBride estrela esta comédia como Fred Simmons, um mestre de Tae Kwon Do incompetente, egoísta e agressivo que coordena seu dojo com mão de ferro.

programme.title: Bodyguard - Resgate de Risco, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um especialista em artes marciais entra para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um rico homem de negócios. A empresa de segurança, propriedade de um velho amigo do combatente, esconde um plano de poder obscuro.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: The Russians Are Coming, The Russians Are Coming, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alan Arkin and Jonathan Winters lead an all-star cast (Carl Reiner, Eva Marie Saint, Brian Keith, Theodore Bikel) in this outrageous comedy about a Russian submarine that runs aground off the New England coast.

programme.title: Hangmen Also Die, (1943, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the German administrator of Czechoslovakia is shot, his assassin tries to elude the Gestapo and struggles with his impulse to give himself up as hostages are executed.

programme.title: Invaders From Mars, (1953, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the early 1950s, Cold War tensions and the burgeoning space race created a heady mix of paranoia and unbridled creativity as filmmakers speculated as to the marvels - and horrors - that lay beyond the stars.

programme.title: It! The Terror From Beyond Space, (1958, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The survivor of a space expedition claims his crew was killed by an alien creature. The rescue captain dismisses the explanation only to find that a creature has stowed away on the spacecraft and begins to hunt the human hosts.

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers, (1956, Science fiction)
programme.desc: People accuse their loved ones of being emotionless impostors. At first, Dr. Bennell tries to convince them they’re wrong, but they’re not. Plant-like extraterrestrials have invaded Earth, taking possession of their souls while they sleep.

programme.title: Shake Hands With the Devil, (1959, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Cagney stars in this action-packed tale of the struggle between the Irish Republican Army and the British Black and Tans, as an Irish-American medical student (Don Murray) takes up arms with the rebellion after losing his best friend!

programme.title: Odd Man Out, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

programme.title: The Delicate Delinquent, (1957, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lewis plays Sidney Pythias, a bumbling janitor caught up in the middle of a gang rumble. Mistaken for a member of the switchblade set, Sidney is encouraged to undergo a 180-degree transformation - from street hoodlum to full-fledged policeman!

programme.title: The Sad Sack, (1957, Comedy)
programme.desc: A bumbling hero with a photographic memory winds up in Morocco as a private in the French Foreign Legion. He still hasn't adjusted after 18 months. Among other things, he's lost a tank.

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol, (2011, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: The Creeper terrorizes a group of varsity basketball players, cheerleaders and coaches who are stranded on a highway after their bus breaks down. Fighting their own fears and prejudices the group of athletes are forced to come together to stay alive.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: The Woods, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: A teenager is dropped off at a remote all-girls school deep in the forest. As her classmates start to disappear, the teenager begins to suspect that things are not what they appear to be at the school and that there is something in the forest.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: Darkness, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror film, from the director of [REC], a teenage girl (Anna Paquin) moves into a remote countryside house with her family, soon discovering horribly disturbing truths about the old place.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Joy Ride, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: When a psychotic trucker takes offense at the pranks pulled by a couple of college students, the young kids are sucked into a whirlpool of terror.

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa's seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he's on board: He is an operative in a plot to kill a rich and powerful businessman .... And Lisa is the key to its success.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira gains a new ability called Bites the Dust, a bomb that automatically kills anyone who tries to discover Kira’s identity through Hayato. Realizing that the only people who could stop Kira are ones with similar powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 1
programme.desc: Hayato’s attempt to kill Kira using Stray Cat’s air bullet ends in failure. Kira realizes that letting Hayato repeat the same morning is becoming a risk, so he decides to undo Bites the Dust after he sees through Rohan’s death.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and Hayato hide inside a nearby residence to escape from Deadly Queen and Stray Cat’s attack. But to their horror, Kira is somehow able to close in on them from outside the house.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Takeru joins the Crasher Squad once again after Naoto proved his innocence.
programme.sub-title: A Friendship That Spans The Universe

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Gash is determined to defeat Gyron, the ruler of Planet Marmelo and refuses the Crasher Squad's help.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Gush asks Mika, who is transmission expert, to help him contact the negative Espers hiding on Planet Marmelo.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Gush infiltrates the enemy base alone to save Mika, an uncharacteristic move for a man who is known for his ruthlessness.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Killua faces Shoot while Gon takes on Knuckle.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Colt surrenders and seeks the help of the extermination team to help the dying Queen.
programme.sub-title: One Wish x And x Two Promises

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: After losing to Knuckle and Shoot, Gon and Killua return home to Palm.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: While Gon is on his date with Palm, Killua encounters Rammot in the forest. Just when their battle is about to begin, Killua hears his brother's voice in his head, telling him to run away.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Knuckle and Morel appear to be overwhelmed by the speed of Cheetu's attacks, but they have a chance at victory.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Kalluto, Feitan, Shalnark, Phinks, Shizuku, and Bonolenov meet in Meteor City, the home of the Phantom Troupe. They have returned after getting the news that the Chimera Ant, Zazan, has built her nest in their city.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The members of the Phantom Troupe go to Zazan's nest to defeat her. The Troupe splits up to confront Zazan's minions individually. As they battle, each member of the Troupe reveals their secret ability.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: A pair of Chimera Ants appears and hunts Gon under the cover of night, overwhelming him with their attacks. Feeling that things are at a standstill, he gathers up his Nen and prepares to throw a punch.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Knuckle and Shoot are lying in wait for Cheetu. But just as Cheetu is about to approach them, he suddenly changes direction and disappears. Meanwhile, Killua and Gon sense that someone is following them again.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 1
programme.desc: Yoshihiro Kira spots Kosaku Kawajiri and instantly recognizes that it’s actually his son, Yoshikage. Meanwhile, Josuke, Okuyasu, and Mikitaka find a strange man living in an abandoned electrical tower.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the electrical tower again to save Mikitaka and defeat Toyohiro Kanedaichi. Meanwhile, Rohan receives a visit from a first-class architect named Masazo Kinoto, who’s come to estimate the repair costs to his burnt house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinoto’s Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichi’s disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohan’s back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 1
programme.desc: Kosaku Kawajiri is forced to kill Hayato after the boy threatens to expose him as a killer. To make matter worse, Kosaku learns from his father, Yoshihiro, that Rohan and the others are coming to investigate the Kawajiri family shortly.

programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.desc: When the world's heavyweight champion is sent to prison, everything points to an inevitable showdown with the penitentiary's undefeated champ. But to make sure the meeting will happen, a former mob boss must call in favors from the outside world.

programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing he’s got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Southside With You (Miramax), (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: From executive producer John Legend comes the touching love story inspired by the romantic first date between President Barack Obama and the First Lady.

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Bebe's Kids, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When ladies' man Robin meets the beautiful Jamika at a funeral service, he feels he must have died and gone to heaven.

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sarah has always been different. So as the new girl at St. Benedict's Academy, she immediately falls in with the high school outsiders. But these girls won't settle for being powerless misfits.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: When a power-crazed despot schemes to buy California from Mexico, it takes two Zorros--the legendary Don Diego de la Vega and his chosen successor Alejandro Murrieta, a dashing bandit-turned-hero-- to defeat the tyrant's unscrupulous plans.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Force 10 From Navarone, (1978, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A group of allied commandos on a mission against the 3rd Reich has orders to blow a giant dam in order to crush a strategic bridge held by the Nazis.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Goin' South, (1978, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: JACK NICHOLSON plays Henry Moon, a third-rate outlaw, in this romantic comedy set in the 1860s.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Valon's battle rages to its climax as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the same armor that Valon used against him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel. However, he faces a fresh and determined Mai.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael - but this time, the Pharaoh doesn't have Yugi to protect him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael appears to be creating an opening for the Pharaoh's counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated.

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends – and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HALFWAY ACROSS THE GRAND LINE / ARRIVAL AT THE RED LINE!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HE HATES THE STRAW HAT CREW / IRON MASKED DUVAL MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FATED REUNION! SAVE THE CAPTIVE FISHMAN

programme.title: The Straw Hats wage a death-defying battle with a group of flying fish, and Luffy is shocked by the familiar face of their latest enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TRAGEDY! THE TRUTH HIDDEN UNDER DUVAL'S MASK

programme.title: Sanji squares off against his lookalike, Camie shows off just how fast a mermaid can swim, and Luffy defeats a giant bull without even landing a blow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXPLOSION! SUNNY'S SUPER-SECRET WEAPON, GAON CANNON

programme.title: After their showdown with Duval, Luffy and the Straw Hats enjoy a hearty meal before proceeding to the site of their next adventure – an island bursting with bubbles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DISEMBARKING WITH SIGHTS SET ON FISH-MAN ISLAND / THE SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters – eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: The Straw Hats join forces with Kidd's crew and Trafalgar's mates to make short work of the marines, but they're in for a surprise when they encounter a Warlord of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE SIEGE! THE NAVY VS. THE THREE CAPTAINS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew duck the marines by hiding out at Rayleigh's house. While Chopper tends to Hachi, Rayleigh entertains the Straw Hats with tales of his days as first mate on Gold Roger's ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ROGER AND RAYLEIGH - THE KING OF THE PIRATES AND HIS RIGHT HAND MAN

programme.title: Admiral Kizaru has arrived to lead the marines on a mission to wipe out all pirates. Meanwhile, Luffy and his crew prepare for a deadly battle with one of the Warlords of the Sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NO ESCAPE!? ADMIRAL KIZARU'S LIGHT SPEED KICK!!

programme.title: A groovy pirate belts out a tune that leaves Kizaru in pieces, but the admiral pulls himself together in time for a crushing Light Speed Kick. Luffy and Sanji try to protect the injured Zoro from a Warlord lookalike.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OVERWHELMING! THE NAVY'S FIGHTING WEAPONS, THE PACIFISTAS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats narrowly defeat a robot that resembles one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. But before the dust settles on the field of battle, a far deadlier foe comes looking for a fight.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EVEN STRONGER ENEMY APPEARS! THE BATTLE AXE-CARRYING SENTOMARU

programme.title: Zoro's barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU'S FIERCE ASSAULT / THE STRAW HATS FACE CERTAIN DEATH!

programme.title: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ELIMINATED FRIENDS - THE FINAL DAY OF THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / BOSS LUFFY APPEARS AGAIN

programme.title: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / DEFEAT THRILLER COMPANY'S TRAP!

programme.title: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING! THE ALL-FEMALE ISLAND, AMAZON LILY

programme.title: An army of scantily-clad women warriors want to investigate Luffy's family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY BACK TO YOUR FRIENDS! THE MAIDEN ISLAND ADVENTURE

programme.title: The women chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she's about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE FALLS IN LOVE! PIRATE EMPRESS HANCOCK

programme.title: Luffy's search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a "drop-in" on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET HIDDEN ON THE BACKS / LUFFY AND THE SNAKE PRINCESS MEET

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsène Lupin…
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for…
programme.sub-title: Where are the Peking Man's Bones?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue and nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata inside.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs.
programme.sub-title: Lupin is Available to the Highest Bidder

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault.
programme.sub-title: Lupin Laughs at the Alarm Bell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life…
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them.
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.sub-title: Detective Hanshichi, The Tenth Year Promise

programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part One

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.sub-title: Mysterious Gang of Five, Part Two

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Jogo de Poder
programme.desc: Xangai, 1930. Os irmãos Lin Zihao e Fang Jie entram em uma briga de gangues para salvar a cidade dos planos conspiratórios do Sr. Tang, pai da mulher que é apaixonada por Lin Zihao e amada por Fang Jie.

programme.title: Sharknado 3: Oh, Não!
programme.desc: Quando uma massa de Sharknados ameaça a Costa Leste dos Estados Unidos, o herói Fin, empunhando uma motosserra, deve novamente arriscar sua vida para salvar seus filhos nas férias de primavera. Mas enquanto ele luta para chegar ao sul, os sharknados se fundem e ficam maiores do que nunca.

programme.title: Osso Duro
programme.desc: Na Ásia para doar seu rim para sua sobrinha moribunda, Deacon, acorda no dia anterior à operação para descobrir que ele é a mais recente vítima de roubo de órgãos. irritado, Deacon desce de seu hotel em busca de seu rim roubado e esculpe um caminho empapado de sangue através dos lugares mais escuros da cidade. O relógio está correndo para sua sobrinha e com cada passo ele perde sangue

programme.title: Guerreiros do Amanhã
programme.desc: O que começa como uma aventura para adolescentes irresponsáveis (diversão, praia, hormônios em fúria) logo adquire um tom apocalíptico quando uma guerra contra a Austrália é deflagrada, o que ninguém poderia prever. Os oito adolescentes precisam escapar e tentar sobreviver em um mundo que não se parece mais com o que era antes.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Assassinos Anônimos
programme.desc: A tensão está insuportável dentro do Assassinos Anônimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos estão tentando descobrir qual deles está por trás de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.title: Jogo de Poder
programme.desc: Xangai, 1930. Os irmãos Lin Zihao e Fang Jie entram em uma briga de gangues para salvar a cidade dos planos conspiratórios do Sr. Tang, pai da mulher que é apaixonada por Lin Zihao e amada por Fang Jie.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a África do Sul com sua família para administrar uma fazenda de leões e desenvolve um vínculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leão branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura épica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Lago Encantado
programme.desc: Jamie, de nove anos, e seus novos amigos de escola devem provar que a doce e mítica criatura marinha do lago é real para salvar sua cidade de um magnata ganancioso. Uma sereia e um mapa do tesouro juntam-se a esta aventura mágica.

programme.title: Diamond Dog Caper
programme.desc: Um corajoso menino enfrenta uma gangue de ladrões trapalhões para resgatar um cão que carrega uma fortuna em diamantes roubados.

programme.title: Cartas para Deus
programme.desc: Um menino lutando contra o câncer escreve cartas para Deus, inspirando esperança entre todos.

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Walt, Antes de Mickey
programme.desc: Baseado no livro "Walt Antes do Mickey", conta os primeiros anos da carreira de Walt Disney.

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico
programme.desc: Um lendário caçador de demônios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que forças malignas estão sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: O Lago Encantado
programme.desc: Jamie, de nove anos, e seus novos amigos de escola devem provar que a doce e mítica criatura marinha do lago é real para salvar sua cidade de um magnata ganancioso. Uma sereia e um mapa do tesouro juntam-se a esta aventura mágica.

programme.title: Walt, Antes de Mickey

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Insanidade
programme.desc: Em uma instalação subterrânea, cinco cientistas acordam do sono criogênico sem se lembrar de quem são ou há quanto tempo estão dormindo. Eles logo chegam a uma conclusão chocante: um assassino está caçando-os lá embaixo e pode até estar escondido entre eles.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.title: Ring 2: O Chamado
programme.desc: Reiko esconde Yôichi quando seu filho começa a exibir poderes terríveis. Enquanto isso, Mai Takano e as autoridades começam uma busca desesperada por eles, enquanto a misteriosa maldição do Anel se espalha.

programme.title: Abismo do Medo
programme.desc: Um ano após um trágico acidente, algumas amigas vão explorar uma caverna. Uma delas, Juno (Natalie Jackson Mendoza), sem avisar as outras, as levou para uma caverna que nenhuma pessoa tinha explorado. Logo elas descobrem que talvez alguém tenha entrado ali, mas nunca saído vivo. Um acidente faz com que uma rocha se desprenda e as amigas fiquem presas na caverna. Com a saída bloqueada, elas passam a explorar o local, buscando outro meio de sair. Porém elas passam a ser perseguidas por estranhas criaturas, que se escondem na escuridão da caverna.

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte
programme.desc: Dallas, Texas. Ben Garvey (Paul Walker) leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa (Piper Perabo) e a filha Katie (Garvey Brooklyn). Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda está em período de experiência. É quando recebe a visita de seu irmão Ricky (Shawn Hatosy), que acabou de deixar a prisão. Ele oferece a Ben a oportunidade de participar do roubo de 12 kg de ouro em pó, pertencentes a um laboratório. Ben inicialmente recusa a proposta, mas após ser demitido volta atrás e a aceita. Só que tudo dá errado, já que Ricky, seu parceiro Phelps (Alex Sol) e um segurança são mortos. Ben é condenado pelas mortes, sendo sentenciado à morte por uma injeção letal. Após a execução, Ben subitamente desperta em uma comunidade localizada em Dundee, no Oregon. O responsável pelo feito é o padre Ezra (Bob Gunton), que lhe diz que sua vida anterior é passado e agora tem em mãos uma segunda chance.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

programme.title: Insanidade
programme.desc: Em uma instalação subterrânea, cinco cientistas acordam do sono criogênico sem se lembrar de quem são ou há quanto tempo estão dormindo. Eles logo chegam a uma conclusão chocante: um assassino está caçando-os lá embaixo e pode até estar escondido entre eles.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.
